::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(sf, spdep, tmap, tidyverse, knitr, GWmodel, ggstatsplot)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_sf <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial",
                 layer = "Hunan")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `Hunan' from data source 
  `/Applications/SMU/S3/ISSS-626/ISSS-626 ZOUJIAXUN/In-class_Ex/In-class_Ex04/data/geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 88 features and 7 fields
Geometry type: POLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 108.7831 ymin: 24.6342 xmax: 114.2544 ymax: 30.12812
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan2012 <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_join <- left_join(hunan_sf, hunan2012)%>%
  select(1:3, 7, 9, 15, 16, 31, 32)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_sp <- hunan_join %>%
  as_Spatial()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_CV <- bw.gwr(GDPPC ~ 1,
                data = hunan_sp,
                approach = "CV",
                adaptive = TRUE,
                kernel = "bisquare",
                longlat = T)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Adaptive bandwidth: 62 CV score: 15515442343 
Adaptive bandwidth: 46 CV score: 14937956887 
Adaptive bandwidth: 36 CV score: 14408561608 
Adaptive bandwidth: 29 CV score: 14198527496 
Adaptive bandwidth: 26 CV score: 13898800611 
Adaptive bandwidth: 22 CV score: 13662299974 
Adaptive bandwidth: 22 CV score: 13662299974 
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_AIC <- bw.gwr(GDPPC ~ 1,
                data = hunan_sp,
                approach = "CV",
                adaptive = TRUE,
                kernel = "bisquare",
                longlat = T)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Adaptive bandwidth: 62 CV score: 15515442343 
Adaptive bandwidth: 46 CV score: 14937956887 
Adaptive bandwidth: 36 CV score: 14408561608 
Adaptive bandwidth: 29 CV score: 14198527496 
Adaptive bandwidth: 26 CV score: 13898800611 
Adaptive bandwidth: 22 CV score: 13662299974 
Adaptive bandwidth: 22 CV score: 13662299974 
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwstat <- gwss(vars = "GDPPC",
               data = hunan_sp,
               bw = bw_AIC,
               adaptive = TRUE,
               kernel = "bisquare",
                longlat = T)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwstat_df <- as.data.frame(gwstat$SDF)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_gstat <- cbind(hunan_sf, gwstat_df)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(hunan_gstat) +
  tm_fill("GDPPC_LM",
          n = 5,
          style = "quantile") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of geography weighted mean",
            main.title.position = "center",
            main.title.size = 1,
            legend.text.size = 0.5,
            legend.height = 1.5,
            legend.width = 1.5,
            frame = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwstats <- gwss(vars = c("GDPPC", "GIO"),
               data = hunan_sp,
               bw = bw_AIC,
               adaptive = TRUE,
               kernel = "bisquare",
                longlat = T)
```
:::
